title.en: A Prayer to Kyabje Tulku Urgyen Rinpoche

text.en: Peerless upholder of the family and Dharma lineages
Of Chokgyur Lingpa, Dharma King of great treasure revealers;
text.en-trans: rik dang chökyi gyüdzin da mepa

text.en: True bodhisattva and vidyādhara, with whom any connection becomes meaningful,
Urgyen Tsewang Palbar, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: orgyen tsewang palbar la solwa deb
